{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=RV082 |revision=(Linksys) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=VPN Router |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425 |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128-J3C150 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V28S40BTP |ram1_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Infineon |eth_chip2_model=ADM6996L |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6999 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, Hex Inverter;Phillips Semiconductor;74LVC04A;;1;,,, Octal D-Type Flip-flop;Phillips Semiconductor;74LVC374A;;1;,,, Micropower Supply Voltage Supervisor;Texas Instruments;C7703I;;1; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.19;OpenRG; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:13:10 }} {{TagLine|10/100 8-Port VPN Router}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/24672-linksysrv082review ''Linksys RV082'' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31525-cisco-rv082-and-rv016-v3-vpn-routers-reviewed ''Cisco RV082 and RV016 v3 VPN Routers'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Like the RV042, the original 016 and 082 used an [[Intel XScale]] IXP425-266 :processor with 16 MB of flash and 64 and 32 MB of RAM, respectively 
Model	   CPU	  Freq.  Flash 	RAM 	Switch
Cisco     Cavium   MHz   (MB)   (MB)    Realtek

RV082 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8309G, RTL8306SD
RV042 v3  CN5010   300	  32	128	RTL8309G
RV016 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8329M
